alert.note: Alert for Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 18 at 5:27PM MST until December 19 at 12:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Visibility less than half a mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet County. * WHEN...Until midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Webcams are showing low visibilities around the Village of Cloudcroft. Other areas in the higher elevations of the Sacs may be affected over the next few hours.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
